item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 44297 - IntPtg must operate with unsigned short. Reading signed short results in incorrect formula calculation

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 44296 - Fix for reading slide background images

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 44293 - Avoid swapping AreaPtgs from relative to absolute

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 44292 - Correctly process the last paragraph in a word file

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 44254 - Avoid some unread byte warnings, and properly understand DVALRecord

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : Add another formula evaluation method, evaluateFormulaCell(cell), which will re-calculate the value for a formula, without affecting the formula itself.

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 41726 - Fix how we handle signed cell offsets in relative areas and references

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 44233 - Support for getting and setting a flag on the sheet, which tells excel to re-calculate all formulas on it at next reload

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 44201 - Enable cloning of sheets with data validation rules

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 44200 - Enable cloning of sheets with notes

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 43008 - Add a moveCell method to HSSFRow, and deprecate setCellNum(), which didn't update things properly

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 43058 - Support setting row grouping on files from CR IX, which lack GutsRecords

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 31795 - Support cloning of sheets with certain drawing objects on them

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 43902 - Don't consider merged regions when auto-sizing columns

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 42464 - Avoid "Expected ExpPtg to be converted from Shared to Non-Shared Formula" on large, formula heavy worksheets

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 42033 - Add support for named ranges with unicode names

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 34023 - When shifting rows, update formulas on that sheet to point to the new location of those rows

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : Support getting all the cells referenced by an AreaReference, not just the corner ones

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 43510 - Add support for named ranges in formulas, including non-contiguous named ranges

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 43937 - Add support for hiding and un-hiding sheets, and checking their current hidden status

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 44167 - Fix for non-contiguous named ranges

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 44070 - Fix for shifting comments when shifting rows
